home_intro_desc: Inspired by the majesty of Indonesia, Spencer Green offers a collection of rooms & facilities designed to harmonize with the breathtaking landscape of Mount Panderman.
room_deluxe_desc: Experience the perfect blend of modern comfort and elegance. Our Deluxe rooms offer a spacious sanctuary with contemporary amenities.
room_superior_desc: Perched on higher floors, the Superior Room offers breathtaking views of the surrounding highlands. Featuring enhanced living space and premium bedding.
room_executive_desc: Designed for the discerning traveler, featuring a separate living area and exclusive access to the Executive Lounge. Enjoy privacy and luxury.
dining_rooftop_desc: Experience dining at the highest point of Spencer Green. The Sky Lounge offers a 360-degree panoramic view of Batu City and Mount Panderman.
dining_botanica_desc: A celebration of local flavors and international cuisine. Botanica serves a sumptuous breakfast buffet and an exquisite √† la carte menu.
dining_candle_desc: Create timeless memories with your loved one. We curate a private table setting with fresh flowers and warm candlelight.
facil_rooftop_desc: Sip on artisan coffee while embraced by the misty clouds. Our rooftop sanctuary offers a selection of local blends and light bites.
facil_dinner_desc: An intimate culinary journey under the stars. Curated private dining experience with a bespoke menu and floral arrangements.
meeting_ballroom_desc: A majestic pillar-less ballroom designed for grand conferences and gala dinners. Featuring a 7-meter high ceiling and crystal chandeliers.
meeting_func_desc: Flexible meeting spaces bathed in natural light, offering panoramic views of Mount Panderman. Ideal for board meetings and training sessions.
meeting_pkg_desc: Designed for efficiency, comfort, and seamless execution.
wedding_intro_title: A Sacred Vow Above The Clouds
wedding_intro_desc: Imagine saying 'I Do' with the majestic Mount Panderman as your backdrop. Spencer Green Hotel offers an intimate, elegant, and unforgettable wedding experience.
wedding_venue_desc: Located on the highest floor, The Sky Chapel offers a 360-degree panoramic view of Batu City. Whether it's a holy matrimony in the morning sun or a twilight reception under the stars.
